reviews.review: 现版本人类很强推荐玩人类入坑

El juego es entretenido, básicamente puedes jugar como killer o como superviviente y cada uno tiene sus peculiaridades que hacen el juego distinto en cada ocasión.

De forma honesta, las primeras partidas es altamente probable que como killer, no encuentres a los supervivientes o que como superviviente te lleves un susto cardíaco por el killer y no saber por dónde están los generadores. Esto cambia con el tiempo de juego, solo jugando vas pillando esa agilidad para pensar como el killer o suponer a dónde irán los supervivientes, así como conocer los mapas y tener esa ventaja.

With this MMR system, I've almost never been able to have fun. I almost always have to "stomp or be stomped," meaning that I either have to sweat to win, or play against sweats when I'm playing to have fun. When I win a game, I barely ever feel satisfaction like I had accomplished something.

Full of fun and gets your blood pumping, putting you on edge as you look around trying to locate the killer as you and your pals decode machines to escape death. Unless you want to be the killer and get a thrill of hunting down the four survivors using your many abilities and perks. The graphics are realistic and pleasing to the eye, there are many characters for you to choose each unique with their own perks and playstyles. You can choose missions to complete to make the game more challenging and get rewards for completing them. Not to mention its so much fun to play with your friends.

Good game overall, though I wish there were more free characters to choose from. A lot of playable survivors and killers are gated behind $$. Thankfully I wouldn't consider it pay-to-win. I also wish there were more frequent updates, but I can't fault the devs for that. The game is solid out of the gate. I would highly recommend it.

I wouldn't have recommend this game a year ago, but after six years Behaviour is making major changes to the grind and the meta of the game that seem like they'll improve it. They even released a roadmap of what looks like good changes across the board.

Итак. После нескольких лет отсутствия в игре я решил в неё вернуться с друзьями. И знаете, баланс игры вызывает дикие вопросы. Вырваться из хватки маньяка без спец.навыка невозможно. Считай, почти не рабочая механика из-за обилия крюков. Которые ещё и не сломаешь, видите ли они авторемонтом обзавелись. Про имбовость большинства маньяков я вообще молчу.
И я бы конечно мог подумать, что я ракал не умею играть, но знаете, раньше в соло у меня было процентов 60 под (играл чисто за сурвов), а сейчас с пати почти всегда ман побеждает.
Так что, судя по всему разрабы забили на баланс и просто пилят новых имба-манов для подымания денег. К покупке не рекомендую, если вы конечно не планируете играть за манов. Тогда вам будет весело

It's fun for a while, especially when you play with a group of friends but it gets very streamlined the farther you go. Eventually, everyone starts running the same perks for both killer and survivor and playing without such perks is a detriment to yourself and to others. Matches become the same back and forth dance and you find yourself wishing the game to be over just as quickly as it began. This game is advertised as one of the top leading games in the horror genre, but there is nothing horror about this game. The only thing terrifying is the lack of response and transparency of Behaviour when talking about balancing the game. Gameplay is as stale as when man first discovered bread. Nothing has changed and even 'frowned upon' tactics (like camping or 'gen rushing') are still used and rewarded and viewed as appropriate tactics with little to no consequences. They bring out iconic and big title horror genre monsters into the franchise only to create a laughing stock caricature of the beloved killer. Being chased by Michael Myers? Don't worry, drop a pallet over his head. A comedy tag should be added to Dead by Daylight because all I can really do is laugh when I see 'Laurie Strode' from 'Halloween' bait Hellraiser's 'Pin Head' into a hole on the map 'The Game' (Gideon Meat Plant) from 'The Saw' movie. Yes that is an actual statement, No I am not joking. The more hours you put into the game, the less empathy you feel for your fellow man. Nothing has robbed me of joy and faith in humanity more than this game has. If you care about your time and energy, I hope you heed my advice and avoid this game. They might bait you into coming back or trying the game out with an iconic killer from an iconic movie, but know it's probably just another hold mouse1 and press-space-skill-check-simulator like it always has been since the dawn of time.

Schöne Grafik, keine Bugs die aufgefallen sind.... aber ... ABER! kein Matchmaking nur viel zu schwache / starke Gegner oder Teammitglieder. War wo es raus kam bestimmt ein tolles Spiel aber derzeit sollte man ganz klar die Finger davon lassen. Habe mit zwei erfahrenen DBD Spielern im Team nicht ein schönes Match innerhalb eines halben Tages geschafft.

I love this game, despite the many mistakes taken by the company and it's toxic community. However, the only "cross-platform-progression" only exists for Google Stadia, which, like, no one uses. I got it on pc under the guise I could get my stuff from my Xbox account, but found nothing. I don't want to play this game until they add more cross-progression.

TLDR: actually League of Legends but survival horror. Play at risk of your mental health.

Game has not changed core problems since I purchased it at pre-release (may 4th 2016). In order to overcome camping killers you either need to play against Pyramid head OR grind the game and hope for tokens to prevent/counter camping. Playerbase isn't amazing either in terms of sportmanship and connection issues. The cosmetic team is carrying the game in terms of covering up bugs and other myriad of issues with shiny outfits and charms now I guess.

Fun to play with friends but otherwise avoid.
